title: Hextech Champion permanent token essentially stole my essence
body: So I purchased the Hextech champ token which offers to "unlock a random,unowned permanent champion, guaranteed to be worth 790 RP or above" but it gave me Rengar which I know I owned previously because I played him last night and he isn't on the free rotation.

replies.body:
Hey Urshnak

I checked into this - Rengar was on free to play last week, so I think it might be that :)

Cheers
Mindstar
